dct_description_sm: Surveyed in 1861 to 67 under the Superintendence of Colonels H.L. Thuillier, R.A., F.R.S., Surveyor General of India, & D.C. Vanrenen, R.A., Superintendent of Revenue Surveys Lower Circle, by E.T.S. Johnson, Assistant Supdt. & Assistants ; Photozincographed under the superintendence of Captn. J. Waterhouse.
Relief shown by form lines and spot heights
Bar scale in furlongs and miles
Shows topography, forts, towns, peaks, drainage, roads/paths
Survey is incomplete and covers approximately 3/4 of area
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain, India Office., Surveyor General's Office.
